questionHtml:
The Milky Way is a #{blank} galaxy.
Cygnus A, which played a major role in Carl Sagan's sci-fi story "Contact", is an #{blank-2} galaxy.
Make sure you get your spelling right!
hintHtml:
The first blank is six letters. ðŸŒŒ

Did you know?

Contact was also a feature film starring Jodie Foster.
feedbackForPerfect:
Perfect! The Milky Way is a spiral galaxy, or a 'barred spiral' galaxy if you wanted to be more specific!
Cygnus A is an elliptical galaxy.
feedbackForImperfect:
The Milky Way is a spiral galaxy, or a 'barred spiral' galaxy if you wanted to be more specific!
Cygnus A is an elliptical galaxy.
